mapper.select: select rownum rn, b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from(select b.*,u.user_name from Boards b join users u on(b.user_id=u.user_id) where board_kind=2 ) a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where rn >(#{page}-1)*10
select count(*) from boards where board_kind=2
select b.* from (select rownum rn,a.* from(select * from Boards where user_id=#{userId} and board_kind=2)a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where rn >(#{page}-1)*10
select count(*) from boards where board_kind=2 and user_id=#{userId}
select b.* from (select rownum rn,a.* from(select * from Boards where board_kind=1 order by board_id desc )a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where rn >(#{page}-1)*10
select count(*) from boards where board_kind = 1
select b.*,u.user_name from boards b join users u on(b.user_id= u.user_id) where board_id =#{boardId}
select rownum rn , a.* from(select * from boards where board_kind = 3 order by board_date desc) a where rownum <= 5

select rownum rn, b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from(select b.*,u.user_name from Boards b join users u on(b.user_id=u.user_id) where board_kind=2 and checks ='N') a where rownum <= #{page}*10) b where rn >(#{page}-1)*10
